column5: I have a guest bedroom available for 1 or 2 persons with an attached private bath and a closet. The common areas such as the living room and the kitchen will be available for use. It is walking distance from the beautiful Hermann Park (5 mins), zoo and the Museum District light rail station (20 mins), only 1.2 miles from Texas Medical Center and 10 mins drive to NRG stadium. You can reach downtown/discovery green in 15 mins from the rail station and avoid parking hassles. Welcome to Houston!
